basic.description: This course facilitates development of the knowledge and skills needed to  become a constructive participant in a college or university budgeting process. Students are exposed to representative institutional budgets and budgetary processes, the budget's role in policy making, the broader economics  and political context of budgeting, the role of institutional culture in   the budgeting process, and budgetary planning for reallocation and retrenchment.
basic.subject: EDH
basic.title: College and University Budgeting
